1 kalastatic kalastatic

1.1 kalastatic.button Button

Toggle full screen Open in new window Toggle example guides Toggle HTML markup

Displays a button on the page.

Parameters

  • title The text to display in the button.
  • href The link to point the button to.
  • active Whether or not the button will be the Active state.

Usage

{# Twig #}
{% include 'path/to/button.twig' with { title: 'Hello World!' } %}

{# Partials #}
{% partial('button', {title: 'Hello World!'}) %}
Example
Markup: partials/atoms/button.twig 
{% if not classes %}
  {% set classes = [] %}
{% endif %}

{% set classes = classes|merge(['pure-button']) %}

{% if disabled %}
  {% set classes = classes|merge(['pure-button-disabled']) %}
{% endif %}

{% if primary %}
  {% set classes = classes|merge(['pure-button-primary']) %}
{% endif %}

{% if active %}
  {% set classes = classes|merge(['pure-button-active']) %}
{% endif %}

{% if href %}
	<a class="{{ classes|join(' ') }}" href="{{ href }}">{{ title }}</a>
{% else %}
	<button class="{{ classes|join(' ') }}">{{ title }}</button>
{% endif %}
Source: partials/atoms/_button.scss, line 1

1.2 kalastatic.button-group Button Group

Toggle full screen Open in new window Toggle example guides Toggle HTML markup

Displays a number of Buttons in an unordered list.

Example
Markup: partials/molecules/button-group.twig 
{% if buttons %}
  <ul>
    {% for button in buttons %}
      <li>
        {% include "@kstat/partials/atoms/button.twig" with button only %}
      </li>
    {% endfor %}
  </ul>
{% endif %}
Source: partials/molecules/_button-group.scss, line 1
